attributes.action: Better Pay for those who work in Early Years Education.
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has reviewed Early years qualifications  to make sure they are sufficiently rigorous and high quality, and many Early years workers are obtaining or have obtained Degree level in their profession but often without financial recognition for their work, with many being in debt to fund the course.
Sign to get the Government to address the rate of pay Early Years workers are paid compared to those in other graduate positions or QTS.
